sourcesContent:
<template>
  <router-link :to="link" class="px-4 py-2" 
          :style="`font-size: ${fontSize};`"
          :class="[rounded, colorText, styleButton == 'none-outline' ? '' : 'border', customClass, `font-${fontWeight}`]"
        >{{ text }}</router-link>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'ButtonComponent',
  props: {
    text: {
      type: String,
      default: 'Button',
    },
    colorText: {
      type: String,
      default: 'text-slate-50'
    },
    background: {
      type: String,
      default: ''
    },
    fontSize: {
      type: String,
      default: '1em'
    },
    fontWeight: {
      type: String,
      default: 'bold'
    },
    styleButton: {
      type: String,
      default: 'none-outline'
    },
    customClass: {
      type: String,
      default: ''
    },
    rounded: {
      type: String,
      default: ''
    },
    link: {
      type: String,
      default: '/'
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
